ygData.subject: Re: Executioners Axe
ygData.msgSnippet: heh, didn t I say I heard it was in lower guk? :) ... From: Jones, Brian  WRONG WRONG WRONG! Seems like both of our good sources are
ygData.messageBody:
heh, didn't I say I heard it was in lower guk? :)

>>> "Jones, Brian" <brian.jones@...> 5.19.99 4:44:18 PM >>>
From: "Jones, Brian" <brian.jones@...>

WRONG WRONG WRONG!

Seems like both of our 'good' sources are wrong in what they tell us. Maybe

before you 'set someone straight' make sure you have it correctly yourself.
This is what the EQ'Lizer had to say,


The Executioners Axe is a very powerfull Warrior
only 2h slashing weapon, it can be found in the depths of lower guk,
I checkd on it May 17th and it is now guarded by 8 spectres
along with the mob that actually drops it, so... high level
expirenced group is required to get this weapon.








> ----------
> From: Zwanenburg, John[SMTP:ZWANENJ@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 8:17 AM
> To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Executioners Axe
>
> From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
>
> WRONG WRONG WRONG!
>
> Folks, lemme set this straight, from what ive heard from good
> sources....the
> execiutioners axe is found either through a quest by killing Crushbone
> himself, of by looting it off his body, its stats ARE 25 damage, 50 speed
> BUT it casts a haste spell which brings the speed all the way down to
> 25!!!
> now thats speed!
>
> If you want to know where to get it for sure, go check the gameznet EQ
> site
> John Zwanenburg
> Tips Support/Support Sipt
> Tel: (613) 998-2745
>
> > ----------
> > From: Jones, Brian[SMTP:brian.jones@...]
> > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com

> > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Executioners Axe
> >

> >
> > The Executioner in Qeynos carries a huge axe and she
> > swings it HARD and FAST. From what people have
> > told me, this is the Executioners Axe
> >
> > Angarth, Clan Anstruther, Warriror of the 15th Tier
> > "Periissem ni periisem"
> >

> > has
> > > even heard of it. Can someone on the list enlighten me??
> > >

> > > Indigo Sista Soldier.
